snippet: A judge in Federal District Court in Manhattan ordered Fresh Step’s manufacturer, Clorox, to temporarily stop showing an ad because it makes “insufficiently reliable” claims.
abstract: Judge Jed S Rakoff of Federal District Court in Manhattan orders Clorox, makers of Fresh Step cat litter, to temporarily stop showing an ad because it makes 'insufficiently reliable' claims about the product's ability to handle odors.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Federal District Court in Manhattan ordered Fresh Step’s manufacturer, Clorox, to temporarily stop showing an ad because it makes “insufficiently reliable” claims.

headline.seo: Judge Orders Cat-Litter Commercial Temporarily Off Air
headline.main: Methods in a Cat-Litter Ad Don’t Pass a Judge’s Smell Test
headline.print_headline: Methods in a Cat-Litter Ad Don’t Pass a Judge’s Smell Test
